languages.text: "Счастлив служить!" {n}Сержант настолько поражен, что гаркает уставную благодарность с совершенно неуставным запозданием.{/n} "Мы не подведем... Не забудем... Молиться Императору за вас будем, Ваш высокобродие!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Возможно, Малгар действительно не очень хорошо вас слышит — или просто не может поверить своим ушам.{/n} "Ваш высокобродие, да вы что! Мы бы и сами... Но теперь-то уж точно выстоим! Всю жизнь вам благодарен буду!"

languages.text: "I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"
languages.original_text: "Счастлив служить!" {n}Сержант настолько поражен, что гаркает уставную благодарность с совершенно неуставным запозданием.{/n} "Мы не подведем... Не забудем... Молиться Императору за вас будем, Ваш высокобродие!"

traits.locale_text: "Happy to serve!" {n}The sergeant is flabbergasted to the point where he barks out the regulation words of gratitude after a pause that goes against all regulations.{/n} "We won't fail... Won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

"Happy to serve!" {n}The sergeant is flabbergasted to the point where he barks out the regulation words of gratitude after a pause that goes against all regulations.{/n} "We won't fail... Won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

"I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

"I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

"I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

"I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

languages.text: "Ich lebe, um zu dienen!" {n}Der Sergeant ist so erstaunt, dass er nach einer nicht vorgeschriebenen langen Pause nur die vorgeschriebenen Worte der Dankbarkeit ausruft.{/n} "Wir werden nicht scheitern ... Wir werden nicht vergessen ... Wir beten um Imperator um Euer Wohlergehen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Sir|Madam}!"
languages.original_text: "I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich lebe, um zu dienen!" {n}Der Sergeant ist so erstaunt, dass er nach einer nicht vorgeschriebenen langen Pause nur die vorgeschriebenen Worte der Dankbarkeit ausruft.{/n} "Wir werden nicht scheitern ... Wir werden nicht vergessen ... Wir beten um Imperator um Euer Wohlergehen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Sir|Madam}!

languages.text: « Je vis pour servir ! » {n}Le sergent est tellement stupéfait qu'il n'éructe les paroles de gratitude réglementaires qu'après une pause un peu trop longue.{/n} « On tiendra bon... On n'oubliera pas... et on priera l'Empereur pour vous, Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: "I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vis pour servir ! » {n}Le sergent est tellement stupéfait qu'il n'éructe les paroles de gratitude réglementaires qu'après une pause un peu trop longue.{/n} « On tiendra bon... On n'oubliera pas... et on priera l'empereur pour vous, Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: “我生来就是为了侍奉帝国！”{n}你的决定让他大吃一惊，他沉默了很久很久，才大声说出了军律规定的感激之词。{/n}“我们绝不会失败……我们绝不会忘记……我们会为您向帝皇祈祷，大人！长官！”
languages.original_text: "I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: “我生来就是为了侍奉帝国！”{n}你的决定让他大吃一惊，他沉默了很久很久，才大声说出了军律规定的感激之词。{/n}“我们绝不会失败……我们绝不会忘记……我们会为您向帝皇祈祷，大人！长官！”

languages.text: 「私は奉仕のために生きていますから！」{n}軍曹は驚きのあまり、義務付けられたわけではない長い沈黙の後、義務付けられた感謝の言葉だけを口にした。{/n}「我々は失敗しません…忘れません…あなたのために皇帝に祈ります、陛下！」
languages.original_text: "I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: 「そのために生きていますから！」{n}軍曹は驚きのあまり、義務付けられたわけではない長い沈黙の後、義務付けられた感謝の言葉だけを口にした。{/n}「我々は失敗しません…忘れません…あなたのために皇帝に祈ります、陛下！」

languages.text: «¡Vivo para servir!». {n}El sargento está tan asombrado que solo exclama las palabras de agradecimiento obligatorias tras una larga pausa para nada obligatoria.{/n} «No fallaremos... No olvidaremos... ¡Rezaremos al Emperador por usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: "I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Vivo para servir!». {n}El sargento está tan asombrado que solo exclama las palabras de agradecimiento obligatorias tras una larga pausa para nada obligatoria.{/n} «No fallaremos... No olvidaremos... ¡Rezaremos al Emperador por usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}!».

languages.text: "Canım feda!" {n}Çavuş o kadar şaşırıyor ki ancak şart olmayan uzun bir duraklamadan sonra şart sayılan şükran sözlerini haykırıyor.{/n} "Başarısız olmayacağız! Unutmayacağız! Sizin için İmparator'a dua edeceğiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
languages.original_text: "I live to serve!" {n}The sergeant is so astonished that he only barks out the mandated words of gratitude after a non-mandated lengthy pause.{/n} "We won't fail... We won't forget... We'll be praying to the Emperor for you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}!"

traits.locale_text: "Canım feda!" {n}Çavuş o kadar şaşırıyor ki ancak şart olmayan uzun bir duraklamadan sonra şart sayılan şükran sözlerini haykırıyor.{/n} "Başarısız olmayacağız! Unutmayacağız! Sizin için İmparator'a dua edeceğiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
